command_group: az monitor log-analytics workspace table restore
description: Manage tables for log analytics workspace restore logs table.

commands.name: az monitor log-analytics workspace table restore create
commands.summary: Create a Log Analytics workspace restore logs table. The table name needs to end with '_RST'.
commands.syntax:
az monitor log-analytics workspace table restore create --end-restore-time
                                                        --name
                                                        --resource-group
                                                        --restore-source-table
                                                        --start-restore-time
                                                        --workspace-name
                                                        [--no-wait]
examples: az monitor log-analytics workspace table restore create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --workspace-name MyWorkspace -n MyTable_RST --start-restore-time "Sat, 28 Aug 2021 05:29:18 GMT" --end-restore-time "Sat, 28 Aug 2021 08:29:18 GMT" --restore-source-table MyTable
